name: AS_GSS_QR_getEvaluationVendorBusinessType
description: Query Record for evaluation Vendor business type
sail_code:
rule!AS_CO_UT_queryRecord(
  recordType: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendorBusinessType_SYNCEDRECORD,
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendorBusinessType_SYNCEDRECORD.typeCode,
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!refBusinessTypeCodes,
      applyWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!refBusinessTypeCodes)
    ),
    ri!additionalfilters
  },
  relatedRecordData: ri!relatedRecordData,
  fields: rule!AS_CO_UT_rejectNullValuesFromArray({ ri!fields }),
  sort: ri!sortInfo,
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  executeWhen: ri!executeWhen,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
  aggregationFields: ri!aggregationFields
)
